body.name: A Valentine for Christmas: A Holiday Romance Novel (Valentine Vineyards Book 1)
body.description: Opposites do more than attract when an older woman falls for a younger man in Reese Ryan’s brand-new Harlequin Desire series, Valentine Vineyards! A red-hot romance between a career-focused woman and a determined younger man? Doctor’s orders! Dr. Julian Brandon is too charming, too sexy and too young for Chandra Valentine. But after the successful bachelor rescues her—twice—she owes him. Still reeling from life-changing family revelations, Chandra somehow agrees to pose as Julian’s girlfriend. And now the irresistible Julian has plans that start with seduction under the mistletoe and end with their fake relationship erupting into a scorching affair. Now Chandra’s questioning everything she believed about love… From Harlequin Desire: A luxurious world of bold encounters and sizzling chemistry. You’ll be swept away by this bold, sizzling romance, part of the Valentine Vineyards series: Book 1: A Valentine for Christmas Read more

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 9, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great story and✍🏾!
reviews.reviewText: Ima enjoy this series as much as I was entertained by, "The Bourbon Brothers". I enjoy the author's writing and just enough spice to make reading fun. This beginning of a new series is exceptional!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 8, 2023
reviews.reviewText: A thoroughly enjoyable romance. Neither is looking for love, both focusing on their careers. However, attraction, emotions and chemistry bind their hearts together.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 20, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Chandra and Julian’s story was so heartwarming. A simple plane ride. This goes to show you never know what to expect.The scene with her brothers and Julian was priceless! Can’t wait to read the next book!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 29, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars A beautiful romance returning romance readers to Magnolia Lakes and The Valentine Vineyards series
reviews.reviewText: Chandra Valentine & Julian Brandon meet in a small pane and bond over turbulence and conversation.But their paths continue to cross as they have the same destination, Magnolia Lakes. For Julian it’s a return to his hometown, but for Chandra it’s the start of her father’s new family venture.Julian and Chandra have a real connection despite the age gap which bothers Chandra. After meeting on the plane, and then again on the way into Magnolia Lakes, and then again in his medical office, it’s clear these two are destined for each other no matter how much Chandra attempts to resist.I loved the chemistry amongst the main and sub characters (Chandra’s family is a hoot, especially the twins), the maturity of Julian facing his issues with his mother head on, and finally all the Valentines mixing with the Abbott family from the Bourbon Brothers series.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 25, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars A Valentine for Christmas
reviews.reviewText: I enjoyed this book very much age doesn't matter it is just a number lo e conquer all and family always matter beautiful ending

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 25, 2023
Reviewed in the United States on January 9, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Oo wee, this is going to be a great series. Chandra finally getting it together with Julian, who happens to be 9 yrs younger. I say, don't miss out on your blessing, because you hung up on age. Age is just a number. They were both a blessing to each other and had more in common than they thought. They both had family matters, jobs to consider, and matter of heart to handle, as they navigated this attraction and love for each other. Her brothers were a trip and I truly enjoyed her sister, Naya.This was a sweet drama free story

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 15, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I'm all for older woman and younger man. It was so cute to see how she was protective of her family and her brothers were protective of her. Can't wait for the upcoming novels.
